name: The Stranger Loop
description:
"What shape is the universe?" "What does it mean to create or work with a four-dimensional object?" "Do programmers often truly understand their own creations?"

A short game about what happens when you modify the arcade game "Asteroids". Concepts are explored partly with words, partly with level design, and partly by you noodling around.

My first Explorable Explanation, made in October 2012 for a personal 7-day jam.
